event.title: Bullet For My Valentine
event.description: Teenage Cancer Trust announce today that Welsh metalcore band, Bullet for My Valentine, will headline Saturday night at the charity’s renowned Royal Albert Hall shows in March this year. Tickets for the gig on Saturday 28 March, which are expected to sell-out, go on sale this Friday (20 February 2009) at 9am.

event.title: Coca-Cola Zero Fest 2009

location.street: Corner Heidelberg and Ring Road East, Alberton

event.description:
Believe It! Coca-Cola ZeroTM is bringing an unprecedented international and local line-up of the hottest rock bands, with 12 hours of rocking music and unbelievable experiences, making it the most adrenalin-fuelled festival in South Africa: Coca-Cola ZeroTM Fest in association with 5FM.

Coca-Cola ZeroTM is offering you the VIP privilege to purchase your tickets a day early on 22nd January, prior to public ticket sales opening day on 23rd January. Visit your nearest Computicket outlet and state the phrase (the 5FM special).

Consumers can now believe that unbelievable things do happen... South Africa, standby for British Rock Royalty and possibly the world's top headline live act - OASIS. Oasis will be supported by SNOW PATROL who got the global spotlight with their 2006 album "Eyes Open" which contains "Chasing Cars". Also featured will be the Grammy nominated, multiple MTV Award winning American rock band – PANIC AT THE DISCO.

And introducing, the band that Q Magazine dubbed "The best British metal band to emerge in years", the Welsh metal-core band Bullet For My Valentine who spent most of the past two years taking over the world with massive U.K., European, U.S. and worldwide tours, sharing the stage with Guns N Roses, Metallica and Iron Maiden, playing the Main Stage at just about every rock festival on the planet!

The Coca-Cola ZeroTM Fest will also feature local favourites like Zebra and Giraffe, The Dirty Skirts, and more.

The Coca-Cola ZeroTM Fest in association with 5FM will take place at Johannesburg's New Market Racecourse on Friday, 10 April 2009 and Cape Town's Ostrich Farm on Monday, 13 April 2009.

Taste life as it should be – Real Coke Taste, Zero Sugar. Grab Coca-Cola ZeroTM, tune into 5FM and watch this space, as we announce more details.

Coca-Cola ZeroTM Fest in association with 5FM is going to rock you!

For more information visit www.cokezero.co.za and www.5fm.co.za.

event.title: Coca-Cola Zero Fest
event.description:
That’s right folks, the 2009 Coca Cola Fest, in association with 5FM and Big Concerts, are proud to announce the lineup and venues!
The Coca-Cola Zero Fest will take place at Johannesburg’s New Market Racecourse on Friday, 10 April 2009 and Cape Town’s Ostrich Farm on Monday, 13 April 2009.

The following international bands will be rocking Joburg and Cape Town:
Oasis
Bullet for my Valentine
Snow Patrol
Panic at the Disco

The local bands playing at the 2009 Coca Cola Zero Fest are as follows:
Zebra and Giraffe
The Dirty Skirts

There are still more bands to be announced, so stay tuned to 5FM or alternatively via RSS or fill in your email address below to get the latest updates from the mycoke.co.za!

event.title: Rockstar Mayhem Festival 2009
event.description: HOLY SHIT, IT'S LIKE HEAVY MUSIC AND STUFF!!!!

event.title: Rockstar Energy Drink Mayhem Festival
event.description: Marilyn MansonBullet fo my Valentine

event.title: Mayhem Festival
event.description:
MARILYN MANSON AND SLAYER TO TOP THE BILL ON
ROCKSTAR ENERGY DRINK MAYHEM FESTIVAL '09

LINEUP FOR RIOTOUS ROADSHOW INCLUDES

BULLET FOR MY VALENTINE, TRIVIUM, CANNIBAL CORPSE, MANY MORE

MAYHEM ENSUES JULY 10 IN SACRAMENTO, CA



LOS ANGELES, CA (January 28, 2009) – Rockstar Energy Drink Mayhem Festival, the most electrifying carnival to ever hit the summer concert circuit, is back...and bigger. Organizers of the Rockstar Energy Drink Mayhem Festival announced today that hard music legends MARILYN MANSON and SLAYER will top the bill on this year's highly anticipated tour, which is set to kick off July 10 at the Sleep Train Amphitheatre in Sacramento, CA. The festival will tear through 27 cities in the U.S. and Canada. Mayhem tickets will go on sale to the public on April 24 - check www.mayhemfest.com and www.livenation.com for more info.

Like last year's Godzillian-sized lineup, the second annual Rockstar Energy Drink Mayhem Festival will feature a gaggle of rock's heaviest bands: the main stage will see Marilyn Manson and Slayer joined by BULLET FOR MY VALENTINE and a special guest that will be announced in the coming weeks; the Jägermeister stage will feature TRIVIUM, ALL THAT REMAINS, GOD FORBID and the Jägermeister Battle of the Bands winner; the Hot Topic stage will feature extreme metal bands CANNIBAL CORPSE, JOB FOR A COWBOY, BEHEMOTH, BLACK DAHLIA MURDER and WHITECHAPEL. The World's Greatest Freestyle Motocross team METAL MULISHA will also be revving up the crowd with their unique style of death-defying motorcycle stunts on all dates.

"Given the great success of last year's festival, we knew that we needed to put together a stellar group of talent for 2009—and we have," says Mayhem producers John Reese and Kevin Lyman. "This will be a blockbuster event, one that blends thrilling live performances with special music-related events and a few yet-to-be-revealed surprises. The result is a concert experience like no other. We're extremely excited to get the show on the road."

"Last year's inaugural Mayhem Festival tour was a definitive success, attracting nearly 340,000 incremental fans to our amphitheaters," said Jason Garner, Chief Executive Officer of Global Music at Live Nation, the tour's co-producer. "This year, the Mayhem team has delivered another great all-star lineup and we anticipate another huge success for Mayhem."

"I have good news and I have bad news to announce," declares Manson. "The good news is that I am completely aware now that our music and our Mayhem tour will have a negative, destructive influence on America. The bad news is that I don't give a fuck."

Manson is currently in the studio working on his forthcoming album scheduled for release in May on Interscope Records. This highly anticipated record reunites Manson and Twiggy Ramirez for their first collaboration since Hollywood in 2001.

Summer 2009 will also see a brand new album from the mighty Slayer, who have already recorded three new songs and are slated to return to the studio in February to finish. Late last fall, Slayer made one of the new tracks, "Psychopathy Red", available as a free online stream to fans, and to date, the song has been posted online at more than one million sites.

"We co-headlined with Manson once before, a couple of years ago," said Slayer's Kerry King, "so we all know what we're getting into. Manson and I probably drank a little too much absinthe on that tour, but we had a really good time hanging out and playing good music - we're looking forward to doing the same this summer on Mayhem."

Says Slayer vocalist/bassist Tom Araya, "We're looking forward to some summer mayhem and playing new sh*t!"

The Rockstar Energy Drink Mayhem Festival is the brainchild of Kevin Lyman, John Reese and CAA's Darryl Eaton, the creative team behind some of the industry's most successful road jaunts, including the long-running Vans Warped Tour and the Worldwide Rockstar Taste of Chaos Tour.

Following the proven model of utilizing sponsorship to deliver a lower ticket price and an enhanced concert experience, the tour organizers have joined forces once again with ROCKSTAR ENERGY DRINK, the festival's Title sponsor.

"We're excited to continue our successful relationship with the festival," says Michael Kelso, Marketing Director for Rockstar Energy Drink. "We're looking forward to delivering a high-energy, mind-blowing event, one that not only brings you the biggest lineup of the summer, but also at an affordable ticket price. Let the Mayhem continue."

In addition to catching a slew of speaker-shredding performances, fans can take part in a number of festival activities, including playing the newest video games, perusing vendors, attending autograph signing sessions and a host of other interactive activities that will add to the festival experience.

Stage sponsor Jägermeister will be sampling their products and providing fun surprises for attendees. "Jägermeister is proud to once again be working with Mayhem and its great staff of people in 2009," says Rick Zeiler, Jägermeister Director of Strategic Marketing. "We plan to not only rock our million dollar mobile stage again this year but Slayer's Kerry King and a host of other great bands have agreed to sign autographs at our activation booth. Once again Jägermeister and Mayhem will prove to be a marriage made in heaven."

Revolver Magazine (who will produce the Official Tour Program) has signed on as official Rockstar Energy Mayhem Festival media partners. Additional sponsors will be announced soon.

event.title: Wacken Open Air 2009
event.description:
Wacken Open Air 2009: The 20th Anniversary - SOLD OUT!

Inofficially confirmed bands:
Warlock or Doro, Accept or U.D.O., Saxon, Rage, Gamma Ray, Mägo de Oz , PAIN, Der W, Subway to Sally, J.B.O., Sonic Syndicate, Schandmaul, Bring Me the Horizon, Eths, Breed77, Bai Bang, Retrospect, Nervecell


Wacken has been known to be the biggest metal festival in Europe (and even the world) for quite some years, and the 2009 edition will go into history as the best days in the history of metal. Even though hell will only be unleashed in some 250 days, every metalhead alive is counting the days for this special event. Wacken, it's time to rock!

Wacken staat al jaren bekend als het grootste metalfestival in Europa (en zelfs de wereld). De 20ste editie zal meer dan waarschijnlijk de kronieken in gaan als het beste evenement in de geschiedenis van metal. Ook al zijn er nog meer dan 250 dagen te gaan vooraleer de poorten naar de hel worden geopend, elke metalhead telt nu al af naar deze gig. Wacken, it's time to rock!

Wacken est connu comme le festival metal le plus grand en Europe (et même dans le monde entier). Cette 20ième édition entrera probablement dans l'histoire de metal comme étant les meilleurs jours du métal. Même a plus de 250 jours avant l'enfer sur terre, chaque metalhead vivant commence a compter. Wacken, it's time to rock!

event.title: W:O:A 2009 (inofficial lineup)
event.description:
THIS IS NOT THE OFFICIALL WACKEN OPEN AIR 2009 LINEUP!
I COLLECTED INFORMATION TO SHOW HOW THE FINAL LINEUP MIGHT LOOK LIKE. THERE IS NO GARANTIE FOR ANY OF THESE INOFFICAL COMFIRMATIONS, THIS LINEUP IS NOT YET COMPLETE!

event.title: Sonisphere
event.description:
Great show, great bands. Quite expensive, but hell worth it. Knebworth is a home of rock. The last 30 years has brought us all time classic concerts. Pink Floyd, Rolling Stones, Lynyrd Skynyrd, The Beath Boys, Devo, Oasis, Frank Zappa, Chuck Berry, Deep Purple, and the last every original lineup shows for both Queen and Led Zeppelin. And now they're inviting some exclusives


Metallica – Knebworth is the only show that Metallica are playing in the UK other than 2009 other than the indoor tour dates that start in Nottingham this Wednesday

Linkin Park – Knebworth is the only show that Linkin Park are playing in the UK in 2009

Avenged Sevenfold – Knebworth is the only show that Avenged Sevenfold are playing in the UK in 2009

Alice in Chains – Knebworth is the only show that Alice in Chains are playing in the UK in 2009

Machine Head – Knebworth is the only outdoor festival that Machine Head are playing in the UK in 2009. They are playing indoor shows with Metallica that start this Wednesday in Nottingham



http://linkin-park.lt
